SEARCH
Package staff

Class Manager

java.lang.Object
staff.Staff
staff.BranchStaff
staff.Manager
public class Manager extends BranchStaff
Represents a Manager staff member who can manage menu items, prices, and availability in a specific branch. Inherits from BranchStaff.

      Constructor to initialize a Manager object.
      Parameters:
      staffName - The name of the manager.
      loginID - The login ID of the manager.
      staffPassword - The password of the manager.
      role - The role of the manager.
      gender - The gender of the manager.
      age - The age of the manager.
      branch - The branch where the manager works.

      Adds a new menu item to the menu list.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the menu item to add.
      price - The price of the menu item.
      category - The category of the menu item.
      available - The availability status of the menu item.
      menuList - The list of menu items to add to.

    • checkDupe

      public boolean checkDupe(String itemName)
      Checks if a menu item with the given name already exists.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the menu item to check for duplicates.
      Returns:
      True if a duplicate item exists, false otherwise.
